content.question: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Choose ONE Chinese regional cuisine (Sichuan, Shanghai, Cantonese, etc.). In your presentation, describe this regional cuisine and discuss the significance of food in Chinese culture.
